dsa_topics.title: Array
dsa_topics.description: Learn about arrays,sorting,searching and much more.

dsa_topics.title: Dynamic Programming
dsa_topics.description: Master the art of solving problems by breaking them down into simpler subproblems.

dsa_topics.title: Greedy Algorithms
dsa_topics.description: Learn how to make locally optimal choices to find the global optimum.

dsa_topics.title: Linked List
dsa_topics.description: Explore different types of linked lists, operations like reversal, and more.

dsa_topics.title: Graphs
dsa_topics.description: Dive into graph traversal algorithms like DFS, BFS, and shortest path algorithms.

dsa_topics.title: Hashing
dsa_topics.description: Learn about hash tables and how they are used in efficient data retrieval.
